title: How To Get A Covid-19 Test At Home In Selangor & KL
author: Tania Jayatilaka
description: See the MOH-approved services offering Covid-19 home screenings in the Klang Valley
cleaned_text: Beh, leading digital health tech solutions provider [BookDoc](https://www.bookdoc.com/) offers onsite Covid-19 RT-PCR tests, which will be facilitated by a team of doctors and nurses sent directly to your home. [Appointments](https://www.bookdoc.com/covid19/covid_test) for this service must be made two days in advance. This service is available in Selangor, Kuala Lumpur, impose an additional transportation fee for on-site Covid-19 tests requested outside of these areas. For more information, contact BookDoc directly at 1300-88-2362. Price for one to 19 pax: RM450 per person Price for 20-99 pax: RM200 per person Price for 100-499 pax: RM190 per person Price for 500 or more pax: RM149 per person Related: [Where To Get Tested For Covid-19 In Kuala Lumpur & Petaling Jaya](https://my.asiatatler.com/life/where-to-get-a-covid-19-swab-test-in-kuala-lumpur-petaling-jaya) BP Healthcare [BP Healthcare](https://my.asiatatler.com/life/bp-healthcare-doctor2u-now-offers-a-covid-19-home-test-coronavirus)'s Covid-19 RT-PCR home tests are available nationwide. Applicants need only fill out an [online form](https://shop.doctor2u.my/house-call-request-form) and make payment to complete their registration for the home test. This package requires a minimum of two people to be tested at home. Contact a BP Healthcare representative at +6012-7133150 or +6018-3215491, or send an email to support@doctor2u.my to learn more.
